name: pneumobilia
description: Refers to the presence of air within the biliary tree, typically observed as linear or branching lucencies within the hepatic ducts or common bile duct on imaging studies such as X-rays, CT scans, or MRIs

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: cannot determine whether pneumobilia is present

values.name: unknown
values.description: uncertainty regarding the presence of pneumobilia

attributes.name: location
attributes.description: The anatomical region of the pneumobilia
